roleset.name: covered with or having tiny spikes (spicules)

example.name: spiculated-j
example.text: The screening mammogram detected a spiculated mass on the right concerning for breast cancer .
example.amr: (d / detect-01 :ARG0 (m / mammogram-01 :purpose (s / screen-01)) :ARG1 (s2 / sign-symptom :name (n / name :op1 "mass") :ARG1-of (s3 / spiculate-01) :ARG0-of (c / concerning-03 :ARG2 (c2 / cancer-03 :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "breast")))) :location (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "right"))))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. "spiculated" is included as an alias because there doesn't appear to be a verbal form, so "spiculated" can't be a past participle (??)
